author: jleroux
msg: Fix a very specific issue reported by Matthieu Bollot on Neogia dev ML.
Matthieu thought it could be related to double quotes in labels when actually it was the conjunction of double quotes *AND* the word locale that Freemarker tried to interpret

Error rendering screen macro [<@renderScreenletBegin id="" title="Mise à jour des champs descriptifs de la fiche article (à supprimer si vous voulez utiliser "alternate locale", autrement dit traduire)" colla
psible=false saveCollapsed=true collapsibleAreaId="" expandToolTip="" collapseToolTip="" fullUrlString="" padded=true menuString="" showMore=true collapsed=false javaScriptEnabled=false />] thru ftl
Message: Encountered "locale" at line 1, column 140 in Sat Jul 24 18:20:26 CEST 2010.
freemarker.core.ParseException: Encountered "locale" at line 1, column 140 in Sat Jul 24 18:20:26 CEST 2010.
I checked, there were not any other cases

author: jleroux
msg: Fix a very specific issue reported by Matthieu Bollot on Neogia dev ML.
Matthieu thought it could be related to double quotes in labels when actually it was the conjunction of double quotes *AND* the word locale that Freemarker tried to interpret
